venues.name: Spa at Loews Vanderbilt
venues.review: The best hotel spa in Nashville — which is not a deeply competitive category yet, making this a reasonable default for anyone who takes wellness seriously in a city that is still figuring out that part of itself. The massage program is particularly strong.

venues.name: Salt Cave Nashville
venues.review: A halotherapy salt cave in East Nashville that serves the neighborhood's wellness-curious population with genuine quality. Forty-five minutes in the salt room, excellent for respiratory issues, stress, and the general conditions of being a person who lives in a city.
